about_the_game:
About


Security Guard - a brand new game from the simulation category, which will allow you to become a security guard known from the most exciting action movies. Many interesting missions, equipment and various locations await you. However, life is not so easy. Your first day will look a bit different from guarding the most important celebrities, but don't worry! Everyone started with nothing.

Character

Your man has his own personality. You can upgrade his skills and make him the best guard in the city. You decide if you want to be sneaky, fast or just clumsy.

Weapons

Different missions require different weapons. Choose between pistols, rifles and other types of them.

Locations

We prepared many interesting locations like houses or celebities' villas. They are very specific so you have to be careful during planning.

Equipment

When securing the location, various precautions are available such as motion detectors, alarms for doors, windows and locks etc. You need to install them properly in tactical locations to have the greatest advantage!

content_descriptors.notes: violence, vulgar language, soft elements of nudity
